description: a piece from the tapestry series Loves of the Gods (Amou des Dieux) produced by the Royal Beavais Manufactory, under the entrepreneur André-Charlemagne Charron; warp undyed wool, 6-9 ends per cm.; weft dyed wool and silk, 24-over 60 ends per cm.
text: From the Loves of the Gods series
title: Apollo and Clytie
